title: 05/24/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/24/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Despite losing game 1 of the playoffs, Colin explains why Laker fans shouldn't be worried about their match up with the Phoenix Suns. He does have bad news for one NBA team that lost the first game of their playoff series and why we could see a big upset early this postseason. He also tells you why he was right about Phil Mickelson and wrong about Chris Paul. Plus, 16 year NBA veteran Derek Harper joins the show to discuss the Mavericks potentially upsetting the Clippers and if the Lakers are in trouble dropping game 1 to the Suns. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
